item.title: Cachedownloader Help - new update almost working!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“WarTusk-RSPS, post:3, topic:551562”]This is the weirdest fix for this issue. I have no idea why this works I can not explain it to you. But this literally is how you fix it.

Switch the first part of your download link with this " https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/ "

The regular " share " link does not work correctly 100% of the time when it tries to auto download your cache’.

So switch your cache link to this:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/r34dgvm86aj9e16/EbahRSPS.zip?dl=0

Please post a reply if this works or not, would love to know! Hope this helps![/quote]

ima try it out and see thanks for helping, not working just tried

Read full topic
item.source: Cachedownloader Help - new update almost working!

item.title: Cachedownloader Help - new update almost working!
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

This is the weirdest fix for this issue. I have no idea why this works I can not explain it to you. But this literally is how you fix it.

Switch the first part of your download link with this " https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/ "

The regular " share " link does not work correctly 100% of the time when it tries to auto download your cache’.

So switch your cache link to this:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/r34dgvm86aj9e16/EbahRSPS.zip?dl=0

Please post a reply if this works or not, would love to know! Hope this helps!

Read full topic

item.title: Cachedownloader Help - new update almost working!
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

My client is not downloading the right cache i want it to, it keeps using the old one how can i change this? I already tried to unzip it uploadit to dropbox and copied the link and replaced my cachedownloader version for the cache.

[code] public class CacheDownloader {

    private client client;
	

    private final int BUFFER = 1024;

    /*
     * Only things you need to change
     *
     */
    private final int VERSION = 2; // Version of cache
    private String cacheLink = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/r34dgvm86aj9e16/EbahRSPS.zip?dl=0"; // Link to cache

[/code]

Read full topic
